item.title: Incorrect 30mph sign entering new 20mph zone, 25th March
item.description:
The existing signs marking the end of the school safety zone in Robert Burns avenue require updating as they suggest hatherley lane is a 30mph zone. It is now a 20mph zone. This is not helping folk stick to the new 20mph limit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Robert Burns Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Public bin removed from London Rd at end of Cudnall St, 24th March
item.description:
Public bin that used to be on London Rd near the end of Cudnall St has been removed and people now going into private gardens to use private bins. Please can this be replaced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5A, Cudnall Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
